reasons_to_visit.details: Festive stalls, mulled wine, and rides fill Princes Street Gardens.
Torchlight procession and street party bring world-famous New Year festivities.
Pubs serve hearty dishes, hot toddies, and seasonal sweets.

reasons_to_reconsider.details: Accommodation and flights book far in advance.

weather.general_tips: Pack thermal layers and festive knitwear; hand warmers are handy for outdoor events.

tourism_level.overall_atmosphere: Magical with lights, carols, and seasonal cheer.

events_holidays.name: Torchlight Procession
events_holidays.description: Families parade from the Royal Mile carrying flaming torches.

unique_experiences.description: Skate through twinkling lights on elliptical rink.
Seasonal pastries and live harp music.

weather.precipitation: Mixed rain and potential snow showers.
weather.general_tips: Carry waterproof boots and hat; roads busy around Christmas.

tourism_level.crowds: Very High over Christmas and Hogmanay.
tourism_level.overall_atmosphere: Festive crescendo culminating in world-famous New Year party.

events_holidays.name: Christmas Day
events_holidays.description: Many attractions close; hotels host special lunches.
events_holidays.notes: Book holiday meals early; limited public transport.

events_holidays.name: Hogmanay
events_holidays.description: Street party, concerts, and midnight fireworks.
events_holidays.notes: Tickets on sale in summer; check bag restrictions.

unique_experiences.practical_tips: Free but ticketed-release dates announced in autumn.

unique_experiences.description: Dance to live bands beneath fireworks.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Dress warmly, plan restroom stops, and arrange meeting points.

unique_experiences.description: Join locals for rehearsal swims ahead of January 1.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Bring robes and warm layers; hot drinks available from beachfront cafes.
